Description: Large fragment from pottery morarium, wavy outside wall, flat base. Yellow clay, light and chalky. Graffito on outside wall below rim: vac τωπολ[.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (p. 61, pl. XXXII, no. 72)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 645, no. 33, pl. 19.1.2)
Villing 2006 / 'Drab Bowls' for Apollo: The Mortaria of Naukratis and Exchange in the Archaic Eastern Mediterranean (p.32 fig.6, no. 9)
Schlotzhauer & Villing 2006 / East Greek Pottery from Naukratis: The Current State of Research (p.56 Table 1)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (HA.11)
